title: The 20 minute wait is too long
body: Are you sure you guys aren't just being jerks?

replies.body:
Hey F3ORA,

I am going to go ahead and lock this thread for spam. Threads should have enough content that they can foster some kind of discussion about the game. We want to keep the clutter off of the boards, so it's important that every thread contribute something to the overall gameplay discussion. 

--KempyreanPirate
Gameplay Warden
If its a normal queue timer over and over, then yes, if its from repetitiously dodging games, then no.
Glancing at his history... it seems fair to assume he is in a low priority que. Working as intended.
